name: Carwashfunathome
0:
”"Alexa, begin Car Wash Manual"”
”"get me the checklist"”
”"take me to the guide"”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: car wash manual
des:
Time spent with family is worth every second. Further, it is priceless if you are spending on your living room on the road i.e. your family car. This skill is for you if you love being with your family and engage in car washing. The skill explains to you the steps for Car wash and vacuum cleaning.
1. Things to keep in mind while cleaning.
2. Tools and substances required for cleaning
3. Step-by-step guide for a car wash.

The entire skill is divided into two broad categories. One is the CHECKLIST, which primarily takes care of the first two points, and a detailed GUIDE, which is the third point. 

The major advantage of enabling the skill is that you take can take an echo device near to your car and understands the steps explained by Alexa while performing the car wash. 

How to use the skill: 
The skill will prompt you to choose either from a checklist or a guide. If you have gone through the checklist and are ready with all the material, appliances, and supplements required for car washing and vacuum skip directly to “Guide” for a detailed explanation else say “Checklist”. 
Checklist: The checklist has 5 checkpoints. After each checkpoint prompt affirmation phrases like “Yes”, “Yeah”, “Yep” etc. to proceed to the next checkpoint. 
Guide: The guide is divided into four steps for ease of understanding and performance along with – “Preparation”, “Dry Cleaning”, “Wet Cleaning” and “Detailing”. These steps are in order of action. Say the name of these steps to take you there. 

Ease of use
The skill is very easy to use:
1. At any steps of checklist or guide, if you want to repeat the last step just say phrases like “Repeat”, “Come again”, “Replay” etc. to repeat the last said step. 
2. You can say “Help me”, “Help me out”, “I want Help” etc., in case you find yourself stuck or a bit confused about steps. 
3. At any time during the course of skill, if you want to exit the skill just say “Cancel” or “Stop”. This is very useful in case of listening to a guide. For example, suppose you have listened to the dry cleaning step.

Your reviews motivate us to build wonderful skills like this one. For more details on the subject visit us on https://applianceslove.in.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
